name: AMT - Alien Medical Technician
description:
(If the game doesn't play, try disabling adblock)

A system failure at an intergalactic cryogenics facility has caused patients to thaw prematurely, and their hearts to stop. As an Alien Medical Technician (AMT), only you can administer life-saving CPR on the wide assortment of alien creatures. But be careful, because each alien has a different heart beat! Play a series of bite-sized rhythm mini-games to restart the patients' hearts and keep them alive!

Programming: Nathan Caldwell and Ben Johnson 

Story/SFX/Music: Andrew Caldwell 

Art: Justin Raimey 

Music: Calvin Brown
